mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM rnum, iii.* FROM ( SELECT inv.*, ui.user_name, isk.tp FROM invoice inv, user_info ui, ( SELECT ii.invoice_num, SUM(ii.qty * it.unit_price) tp FROM invoice_item ii, item it WHERE ii.item_num = it.item_num (+) GROUP BY ii.invoice_num ) isk WHERE inv.user_num = ui.user_num (+) AND inv.invoice_num = isk.invoice_num (+) ORDER BY invoice_date DESC ) iii ORDER BY rnum ) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startNo } AND #{endNo }

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM rnum, iii.* FROM( SELECT it.*,ii.invoice_num,ii.qty,ii.invoice_item_num,ou.order_unit, pu.primary_unit, pu.primary_unit_qty , su.secondary_unit, su.secondary_unit_qty, b.brand_name, c.cate_name FROM item it, invoice_item ii, order_unit ou, primary_unit pu, secondary_unit su, brand b, category c WHERE ii.invoice_num = #{invoiceNum} AND ii.item_num = it.item_num (+) AND it.order_unit_num = ou.order_unit_num (+) AND it.primary_unit_num = pu.primary_unit_num (+) AND it.secondary_unit_num = su.secondary_unit_num (+) AND it.brand_num = b.brand_num (+) AND it.cate_num = c.cate_num (+) ORDER BY it.item_name asc )iii ORDER BY rnum )

SELECT it.*, pu.*, su.*, b.*, sup.*, ou.*, ic.*, sup.*, ui.user_name FROM item it, primary_unit pu, secondary_unit su, order_unit ou, brand b, supplier sup, user_info ui, category ic WHERE it.item_num = #{itemNum } AND it.primary_unit_num = pu.primary_unit_num (+) AND it.secondary_unit_num = su.secondary_unit_num (+) AND it.order_unit_num = ou.order_unit_num (+) AND it.brand_num = b.brand_num (+) AND it.user_num = ui.user_num (+) AND it.supplier_num = sup.supplier_num (+) AND it.cate_num = ic.cate_num (+)
